Office of the Judge Advocate General Leadership Workshop
================================repo{:--------------------------------msp-php-law- pm}

Tender Details
---------------

### Reference Number
Reference Number: W4938-23-050S/B

### Amendment Number
Amendment Number: 7 (published on August 25, 2023)

### Solicitation Number
Solicitation Number: W4938-23-050S/B

### Publication Date
Publication Date: August 3, 2023 (closed bid)

### Closing Date and Time
Closing Date and Time: August 25, 2023, 5:00 PM EST

### Expected Contract Period
Expected Contract Period: September 15, 2023, to November 30, 2023

### Tender Status
Tender Status: Expiration (bid closed)

### Request Type
Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)

### Procurement Category
Procurement Category: SRV (service provision)

### Contracting Entity
Contracting Entity: Canadian Defence Academy (2 Ridout Square, Kingston, Ontario, K7K 7B4)

### Brief Description
The Office of the Judge Advocate General (OJAG) is seeking a service provider to deliver a leadership workshop for senior and intermediate leaders. The objective is to enhance leadership capabilities, inspire teams, and achieve outstanding results through training and development activities. The successful candidate will be able to transform organizations, improve value creation, enhance efficiency, and engage team members to deliver better results.

### UNSPSC Code
80101500 (Business and corporate management consultation services)
